instruction: go to a b c d and h in arbitrary order
ltl: & F a & F b & F c & F d F h

instruction: do not visit d until you visit c visit c only once do not visit c until you visit b visit b only once do no visit b until you visit a visit a only once
ltl: & & U ! b a & U ! c b & U ! d c F d & U ! a U a U !a b & U ! b U b U !b c U ! c U c U !c d

instruction: reach c but not until you visit a and b and that specific order
ltl: & U ! b a & U ! c b F c

instruction: visit a and b
ltl: & F a F b

instruction: go to a b and c
ltl: & F a & F b F c

instruction: visit a then b then c then d and then h visit each landmark only once
ltl: & & U ! b a & U ! c b & U ! d c & U ! h d F h & U ! a U a U !a b & U ! b U b U !b c & U ! c U c U !c d U ! d U d U !d h

instruction: make sure a b and c are all visited
ltl: & F a & F b F c

instruction: do not go to c until you visit b and do not go to b until you visit a and make sure you visit c
ltl: & U ! b a & U ! c b F c

instruction: go to a then go to b or go to b then go to a
ltl: & F a F b

instruction: go to a an infinite number of times
ltl: G F a

instruction: visit a go to b reach c reach d
ltl: & F a & F b & F c F d

instruction: first go to a while avoiding b then move to b
ltl: & U ! b a F b

instruction: make sure a and b are visited infinitely
ltl: & G F a G F b

instruction: go to h not before going d do not go to d before going c do not go to c before going to b and do not go to before going to a
ltl: & U ! b a & U ! c b & U ! d c & U ! h d F h

instruction: stop by abc in any order
ltl: & F a & F b F c

instruction: visit a and then b
ltl: F & a F b

instruction: visit a sometime afterwards visit b sometime afterwards visit c
ltl: F & a F & b F c

instruction: visit a b c d and h in this order without skipping any one of them
ltl: & U ! b a & U ! c b & U ! d c & U ! h d F h

instruction: make sure a b c d and h are all visited
ltl: & F a & F b & F c & F d F h

instruction: visit a and visit b after a is visited
ltl: F & a F b

instruction: eventually first visit a and then b after
ltl: F & a F b

instruction: you must visit a first before going to b
ltl: & U ! b a F b

instruction: go to a then go to b and then reach c then reach d and finally go to h
ltl: F & a F & b F & c F & d F h

instruction: visit b and a
ltl: & F a F b

instruction: only visit a once and do not visit b until you visit a
ltl: & & U ! b a F b U ! a U a U !a b

instruction: visit a b c d in that specific order
ltl: & U ! b a & U ! c b & U ! d c F d

instruction: visit a as many times as you want then visit b as many times but never visit a again then visit c as many times but never visit b again finally visit d
ltl: & U ! b a & U ! c b & U ! d c F d

instruction: visit a b c and d in this order without skipping any one of them
ltl: & U ! b a & U ! c b & U ! d c F d

instruction: make your way to h only after going to d before that make your way to d only after going to c before that make your way to c only after going to b before that make your way to b only after going to a do not go back to the previous location you have visited while heading to the next
ltl: & & U ! b a & U ! c b & U ! d c & U ! h d F h & U ! a U a U !a b & U ! b U b U !b c & U ! c U c U !c d U ! d U d U !d h

instruction: go to a exactly once while avoiding b then go to b
ltl: & & U ! b a F b U ! a U a U !a b

instruction: go to a and only then go to b without returning to a
ltl: & & U ! b a F b U ! a U a U !a b

instruction: keep going to a and b in arbitrary order
ltl: & G F a G F b

instruction: reach a
ltl: F a

instruction: before visiting b c d and h visit an and never visit it again then visit b before c d and h and never visit it again do not visit d and h until you visit c never visit c again then visit d before h and never visit h again finally visit h
ltl: & U ! b a & U ! c b & U ! d c & U ! h d F h

instruction: eventually in some sequence visit a b c and d each must be followed by the next
ltl: F & a F & b F & c F d

instruction: visit a
ltl: F a

instruction: a b and c must be visited
ltl: & F a & F b F c

instruction: do not visit b until you go to a
ltl: & U ! b a F b

instruction: make sure a b c and d are all visited in this order
ltl: F & a F & b F & c F d

instruction: do not visit c until visiting b do not visit b until visiting a
ltl: & U ! b a & U ! c b F c

instruction: frequent a b and c infinitely in any order
ltl: & G F a & G F b G F c

instruction: find a b and c
ltl: & F a & F b F c

instruction: visit a b c d and h in this order there can be other landmarks in between
ltl: F & a F & b F & c F & d F h

instruction: visit a b c d and h
ltl: & F a & F b & F c & F d F h

instruction: make your way to a b and c consecutively
ltl: F & a F & b F c

instruction: head to a and then to b after a is visited and then to c after b is visited and then to d after c is visited
ltl: F & a F & b F & c F d

instruction: visit a then b then c and then d you can only visit each landmark once
ltl: & & U ! b a & U ! c b & U ! d c F d & U ! a U a U !a b & U ! b U b U !b c U ! c U c U !c d

instruction: please visit a infinitely often
ltl: G F a

instruction: frequent a b c and d infinitely in any order
ltl: & G F a & G F b & G F c G F d

instruction: visit b a c and d
ltl: & F a & F b & F c F d
